title: font in "control" trailer
content:
[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7c2\_B\_cWK\_M](http://web.archive.org/web/20120716211157/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=7c2_B_cWK_M "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7c2\_B\_cWK\_M")

is this helvetica? doesn't look like it to me.
author: derl

comments.content:
Judging from the S and R, which were two of the key diagnostic letters I noticed, I would say it looks like Helvetica.

- Mike Yanega
